Class: Storage

Defined in: src/utils/storage.coffee

Overview

Browser Storage Module

@module

Author:

  • Sam Ternent

Instance Method Summary

  • # (void) setLocal(name, value) Set local storage object
  • # (void) setSession(name, value) Set session storage object
  • # (Object) getLocal(name) Get local storage object
  • # (Object) getSession(name) Get session storage object
  • # (void) removeLocal(name) Remove local storage object
  • # (void) removeSession(name) Remove session storage object

Instance Method Details

# (void) setLocal(name, value)

Set local storage object

Examples:

Set local storage object 

yaks.UTILS.storage.setLocal('name', {storage: object});

Parameters:

  • name ( String ) — key/name
  • object ( Object ) — to be stored

# (void) setSession(name, value)

Set session storage object

Examples:

Set session storage object 

yaks.UTILS.storage.setSession('name', {storage: object});

Parameters:

  • name ( String ) — key/name
  • object ( Object ) — to be stored
